name: Loose Cannon 23
description:
In this 2D platformer, you can use the recoil of your cannon to reach amazing speeds and get the treasure!

Controls:

- WASD to Move
- R To Reset Level
- Space to Jump
- Click to Fire Cannon
Your player will be shot in the opposite direction of the mouse

- Hold W on Walls to climb
- Hold E on Walls to Stick to the wall
- While holding E, press Jump on the wall to wall Jump. Or Press W to Climb or S to fall

- GO FAST

By:

Preston C

Carson L

Jackson H

Evan S
